title: Global asset management firm BlackRock leases office space in Mumbai’s Worli
description: BlackRock Inc. signed a five-year lease for 42,700 sq ft office space in Mumbai’s Worli area. The lease includes rent escalations and a 36-month lock-in period. This move mirrors the robust demand in India's office sector, boosted by improved infrastructure. BlackRock, present in India since 2008, seeks to leverage the nation's growing financial markets.
